name: Drill Drone
description:
Drill Drone

Drill Drone is a game created in under 48 hours. Drill deeper to collect more items and gems. Use these items to go deeper to collect more items and gems. Buy upgrades with gems to go deeper to collect more items and gems. I sense a pattern...

Controls:

The game supports keyboard

  • A,D - Move Drone / Point Drill
  • Space - Jump
  • J - Use Drill
  • K - Use Item
  • Q,E - Scroll Item Left/Right
  • Backspace - Restart Game (if you get stuck)
Details:

Travel as deep as you can while collecting items. Your energy is always depleting, collect batteries to refill your meter. Use gems to upgrade your drone after each run. 

Items:
  • Bombs - blow up an area of blocks.
  • Acid Flask - melt away blocks and can travel to adjacent blocks.
  • Platforms - help you reach high places.
  • Batteries - replenish your energy meter.
  • Gems - used to upgrade your Drone at the end of each run. Upgrades and gems carry over from run to run.
Credits:

Game by Alejandro Robles (Rohbert)
